```{r}
library(bayesrules)
library(tidyverse)
library(fivethirtyeight)
```

```{r}
data(football)
control_subjects <- football |>
  filter(group == "control")
```

```{r}
# a
control_summary <- control_subjects |>
  summarize(mean_volume = mean(volume), sample_size = n())
```

```{r}
# b
summarize_normal_normal(mean = 6.5, sd = 0.4, sigma = 0.5, y_bar = control_summary$mean_volume, n = control_summary$sample_size)
```

```{r}
# c
plot_normal_normal(mean = 6.5, sd = 0.4, sigma = 0.5, y_bar = control_summary$mean_volume, n = control_summary$sample_size)
```
